//: Capping these at 1000 L and kg to prevent bodies and meat disappearing, otherwise specific gravity of dinos should range from 0.75 kg/L for pterosaurs, 1 for most, to 1.2 kg/L for ankylosaurs
description: a dinosaur
Small, thin predatory bipedal dinosaur with a long head and sharp teeth and long grasping claws.
A medium dinosaur with sharp teeth and two prominent bony crests on its head.
A large, fast predatory bipedal dinosaur, decorated with three colorful horns on its head and dotted with bright skin bones with long sharp teeth and a long flexible tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 15000 L and 15000 kg
description: A huge dinosaur about the size of a small house, with a ferocious crocodile-like head and a sail on its back.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 5000 L and 5000 kg
description: A large bipedal predator dinosaur with a large head, long sharp teeth, short strong arms, and long tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1700 L and 1700 kg
description: A large bipedal dinosaur with a mouth full of sharp serrated teeth.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 4000 L and 4000 kg
description: Huge predatory bipedal dinosaur with a tall ridge running the length of its back covered with heavy muscles.  Its teeth are curved and serrated like sawblades.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 4000 L and 4000 kg
description: Huge predatory bipedal dinosaur with long claws and strong arms for grappling.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1500 L and 1500 kg
description: Large sharp teeth and a lean frame, with long wicked claws and a feathered mullet and tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1500 L and 1500 kg
description: Enormous teeth, fierce eyes, and a powerful frame to drive it forward, with two small arms and a feathered mullet and tail.  The snout is long with six ridges.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2500 L and 2500 kg
description: Enormous teeth, fierce eyes, and a powerful frame to drive it forward, with two small arms and a feathered mullet and tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2000 L and 2000 kg
description: Enormous teeth, fierce eyes, and a powerful frame to drive it forward, with short arms and a feathered mullet and tail.
This large, bipedal, feather-covered dinosaur has a long, gator-like mouth with sharp teeth.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1500 L and 1500 kg
description: Bipedal dinosaur with long sharp teeth in a massive jaw, fierce eyes, and a powerful frame to drive it forward, short arms, with a feathered white mullet and tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2500 L and 2500 kg
description: Bipedal dinosaur with long sharp teeth in a massive jaw, fierce eyes, and a powerful frame to drive it forward, short arms, with a feathered mullet and tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 8500 L and 8500 kg
description: Enormous teeth in a massive jaw, fierce eyes, and a powerful frame to drive it forward, short arms with large claws, with a feathered mullet and tail.
A fast moving bipedal dinosaur about the size of a turkey.  Its teeth and claws are small but sharp.
A feathered bipedal dinosaur, standing as tall as a human.  It looks somewhat like a reptilian ostrich.
A feathered bipedal dinosaur, standing as tall as a human.  It looks somewhat like a reptilian ostrich with a long stiff tail.
A feathered bipedal dinosaur, standing as tall as a human.  It looks somewhat like a reptilian ostrich with a small toothless beak and curved claws good for climbing.
A small, feathered bipedal dinosaur with a long feathered tail.
A large feathered bipedal dinosaur with a pot-bellied stomach and a long neck.  Sharp claws extend from its dexterous hands.
A large feathered bipedal dinosaur with a long neck, a beak and a large head crest.  Sharp claws extend from its dexterous hands.
A small bipedal dinosaur covered with feathers.  Small, hooked claws emerge from its feet and hands.
A small bipedal dinosaur covered with feathers.  Small, hooked claws emerge from its feet and hands.
A medium-sized bipedal dinosaur covered with feathers.  At the end of each foot is a large sickle-like claw.
A large bipedal dinosaur with feathered arms, a long tail, and scythe-like claws.
A small bipedal dinosaur covered with feathers.  Small, hooked claws emerge from its feet and hands.  The teeth are large and sharp and the jaws look strong.
A small bipedal dinosaur covered with feathers.  At the end of each foot is a large sickle-like claw.  Its eyes suggest intelligence.
A bipedal dinosaur about the size of a chicken.  It darts around quickly and has long arms for grabbing what it desires.  It's holding something.
A bipedal plant eating dinosaur with a long neck and tail, strong grasping hands and leathery skin.
A four legged plant eating dinosaur with a long neck, dexterous hands and leathery skin.
A large bipedal plant eating dinosaur with a long neck and tail and leathery skin.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 12500 L and 12500 kg
description: Massive, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur with a whip-like tail and tall shoulders.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2500 L and 2500 kg
description: Massive, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur with a whip-like tail and two rows of tall spines running down the neck and back.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 20000 L and 20000 kg
description: Massive, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur with a long, whip-like tail.  The head is upright and the neck looks like it would make a good strong club.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 15000 L and 15000 kg
description: Massive, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur with bulky torso and long, whip-like tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 15000 L and 15000 kg
description: Huge, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur with a long, whip-like tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 16000 L and 16000 kg
description: Huge, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur with a long, whip-like tail and one large claw on each foreleg.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 47000 L and 47000 kg
description: Huge four-legged dinosaur with a square head and a shorter neck and tail than similar dinosaurs.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 40000 L and 40000 kg
description: Massive, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur with longer forelegs and a whip-like tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 70000 L and 70000 kg
description: Gigantic four-legged dinosaur with a long neck and spiked tail protected by natural bone armor.
Small, four-legged dinosaur with five rows of protective plates running down its back.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 3170 L and 3800 kg
description: A huge slow quadruped dinosaur with two rows of tall plates on its back, and a spiked tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2900 L and 3500 kg
description: A huge slow quadruped dinosaur with two rows of long plates on its back, and a spiked tail.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1575 L and 1900 kg
description: This heavily armored four legged dinosaur has a long tail, a beak, and large shoulder spikes.

//: Speed is a guess based on the lighter armor and smaller weight
description: This lightly armored four legged dinosaur has a rigid spiked tail, a beak, and sturdy spikes along the sides.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1650 L and 2000 kg
description: This heavily armored four legged dinosaur has a beak, a long tail, and long wicked-looking spikes jutting out of the neck.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2900 L and 3500 kg
description: This heavily armored four legged dinosaur has a beak and large bony plates covering the back.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1330 L and 1600 kg
description: This heavily armored four legged dinosaur has a lumpy armored head with a beak and thick plates protecting the cheeks, thick back armor, and small short spikes along the sides.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2500 L and 3000 kg
description: This heavily armored dinosaur is covered with small ridged bony plates with long bony spikes.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2000 L and 2500 kg
description: This four-legged armored dinosaur has horns on the head and large spikes in rows along the back and side.  Its spiked tail ends in a similarly pointy club of bone.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1650 L and 2000 kg
description: This heavily armored four legged dinosaur has a beak and a long tail ending in a spiked club of bone.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 5000 L and 6000 kg
description: This heavily armored four legged dinosaur has a long tail ending in a massive spiked club of bone.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1650 L and 2000 kg
description: This heavily armored four legged dinosaur has a horny beak, two bony rings protecting the neck, and a long tail ending in a heavy club of bone.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 1815 L and 2200 kg
description: This heavily armored four legged dinosaur has several long spikes along the back and a long spiked tail ending in a club of bone.
A feathered dinosaur with four legs, a beak, and a long broad tail.
A small feathered dinosaur standing on two legs with short arms, a long neck, and a horned beak.
A large feathered dinosaur with four strong legs, broad shoulders and a pointed beak.  It moves slowly but with enormous strength.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 3000 L and 3000 kg
description: A bulky, beaked dinosaur with hooved front legs and strong clawed back legs.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 4000 L and 4000 kg
description: A huge scaly dinosaur with hooves and long heavy tail.  Has a flat beak, thick nose, and small spiky head crest.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 2500 L and 2500 kg
description: A huge scaly dinosaur with hooves and a broad toothless beak with a narrow arching nasal hump.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 3000 L and 3000 kg
description: A huge scaly dinosaur with hooves and a broad beak filled with hundreds of small teeth with a small nasal crest just above and in front of the eyes.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 3000 L and 3000 kg
description: A huge scaly dinosaur with hooves and a broad beak filled with hundreds of small teeth with a spiky head crest at the top of the skull reaching behind.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 5500 L and 5500 kg
description: A huge scaly dinosaur with hooves and a broad toothless beak.  There are teeth deeper in the mouth.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 4000 L and 4000 kg
description: A huge mottled dinosaur with four legs, a narrow beak, and a curved head crest.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 3000 L and 3000 kg
description: A huge scaly dinosaur with a long stiff tail and hooves.  Has a narrow beak and a tall head crest that looks like a mitten with the thumb pointed up.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 4000 L and 4000 kg
description: A huge scaly dinosaur with a thick neck and tail and hooves.  Has a short beak and a tall rounded head crest.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 4000 L and 4000 kg
description: A huge scaly dinosaur with a tall ridge down the back, a tail and hooves.  Has a short beak and a wide, rounded head crest.
A small feathered bipedal dinosaur about the size of a goat.  It looks like a reptilian ostrich with a round hard-looking domed head.
A feathered bipedal dinosaur, standing as tall as a human.  It looks like a reptilian ostrich with a round hard-looking domed head.
A small rhino-like dinosaur with a bony crest studded with small horns and a hooked beak.
A rhino-like dinosaur with a bony crest and sharp beak able to walk on two legs and four.
A rhino-like dinosaur with a tall thin bony head crest, two long brow horns, and a beak.

description: A large stocky four-legged dinosaur with a bony crest with several long spikes and one large horn above the beak and a short tail.

description: A large stocky rhino-like dinosaur with a bony crest and one large horn above the nose.

description: A large stocky rhino-like dinosaur with a tall bony crest and one large horn above the nose curving forward towards the beak.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 3000 L and 3000 kg
description: A large stocky rhino-like dinosaur with a tall bony crest with two long curved spikes and three rough bosses above the eyes and nose as well as a short tail and hooked beak.

description: A massive four-legged dinosaur with a bony crest from which two curved horns and a broad bony nose emerge.  There is also a curved beak and short tail.

description: A massive rhino-like dinosaur with a tall bony crest from which three short horns emerge above the eyes and beak.

description: A massive rhino-like dinosaur with a tall bony crest from which four long horns and a short nose horn emerge.

description: A massive rhino-like dinosaur with an ornate spiked neck crest and two long horns curving up and to the sides from above its eyes.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 5000 L and 5000 kg
description: A massive rhino-like dinosaur with a tall bony crest from which two long wicked horns emerge.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 7000 L and 7000 kg
description: A massive rhino-like dinosaur with a bony crest from which three large horns emerge.
A feathered bipedal dinosaur about the size of a cat with a small head and arms, long legs, and a tail.
A feathered bipedal dinosaur with long claws about the size of a turkey.
A sturdily built feathered bipedal dinosaur with a long narrow beak and strong arms about the size of a cow.
A feathered flying reptile over three feet long, with short wings and a big colorful beak.
A large feathered flying reptile, with a long pointed toothless beak and a long pointy head crest.
A huge feathered flying reptile, with a long pointed toothless beak and a long stiff neck.

//: When large weights and volumes are fixed this should be 10000 L and 10000 kg
description: A huge aquatic reptile about the size of a small house, with a ferocious crocodile-like head and powerful swimming fins.
